meanings.definition: Feeling or showing irritation or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: She was pissier than usual after waiting in line for so long.
meanings.sent2: The customer became pissier when his order was incorrect.
meanings.sent3: His pissier expression made everyone around him uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds made the sky look even pissier.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's pissier tone made the students realize they were in trouble.

meanings.definition: To make someone feel irritated or annoyed.
meanings.sent1: Please don't pissier your sister by teasing her.
meanings.sent2: His constant complaints started to pissier his friends.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy loved to pissier the older dog by stealing its toys.
meanings.sent4: The persistent buzzing of the fly began to pissier everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The loud music from the party next door was starting to pissier the neighbors.
